text: Ara yara imana ane, allah‌ tadera jan'ya pesa karena phira’a'unera strira drstanta, yakhana se e bale prarthana karechila, ‘he amara raba! Apanara sannidhane jannate amara jan'ya ekati ghara nirmana karuna ebam amake ud'dhara karuna phira’a'una o tara duskrti hate ebam amake ud'dhara karuna yalima sampradaya hate.’
